data.actual_result: There is big space between "Play on Spotify" and the listen along button
data.expected_result: It should not randomly get smaller and have massive padding in between the buttons
data.short_description: On Spotify rich presence, the "Play on Spotify" button is smaller compared to stable/ptb
data.steps_to_repro: - Listen to Spotify - Inspect your profile - Observe the button being smaller
